item.title: Re: Monsters
item.content:encoded:
Not yet, since I don't really have good access to info on them. From what I've pieced together, they periodically attack villages with the Natural Research Facility. Your village has a certain amount of time to kill the monster. Upon successfully killing it, the village gets 2 permanent items. One goes to the Village leader, 1 is distributed psuedo-randomly amongst the villagers (the number of raffle tickets you get is based on the amount of damage that you did to the monster). There's also a chance of getting an upgrade for your village upon successfully beating it.

Once I feel like I've got enough information to write up a page (or series of pages) about it, I'll put it under the Village menu at the top. Each monster will probably get their own page too. Of course, anyone who has this information already can create the page for themselves.

(http://z3.invisionfree.com/Random_Village/index.php?showtopic=115 may help out)

Edit: I started adding some monster stuff. It's under the Village menu, but you can also get it here.
